deniedMessages.create: You don't have permission to create users.
deniedMessages.edit: You don't have permission to edit users.
deniedMessages.manageRoles: You don't have permission to manage user roles.
deniedMessages.deactivate: You don't have permission to deactivate users.
deniedMessages.delete: You don't have permission to delete users.
deniedMessages.reactivate: You don't have permission to reactivate users.
deniedMessages.impersonate: You don't have permission to impersonate users.

myAccount.title: My Account
myAccount.passwordRequiredDesc: Switching to "{role}" role requires password confirmation

mfa.enableDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account by enabling 2-step verification.
mfa.scanQrCode: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
mfa.cantScan: Can't scan? Enter this key manually:
mfa.enterCode: Enter the 6-digit code from your app
mfa.saveRecoveryCodes: Save these recovery codes in a safe place. You'll need them if you lose access to your authenticator.
mfa.disableWarning: Disabling 2-step verification will make your account less secure.
mfa.enterTotpToDisable: Enter verification code from your authenticator app
mfa.regenerateWarning: This will invalidate all your existing recovery codes. Make sure to save the new codes.
